name: ProductOfferingPriceDetail
comment: This entity contains the different pricing options available for a product offering including the amounts, containing fees, tax, and totals.
vf short description: This entity contains the different pricing options available for a product offering including the amounts, containing fees, tax, and totals.

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceDetailSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceDetailKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies a product offering price detail. Generated Key based on Product Catalog Key, Product Offering Price Type Key, Product Offering Price Detaild Id, Effective Date

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceDetailId
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies each permutation and combination of complex (table driven) pricing. Only populated for complex pricing. price.priceRecord.priceRecordId

fields.name: PriceId
fields.comment: The id of the individual price to which the product offering is attached. For simple pricing price.price.idFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.id

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: The effective start date of the individual price to which the product offering is attached. For simple pricing price.price.validFor.startDateTimeFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.validFor.startDateTime//Customization Instruction: Validate during implementation whether validity or price versioning is done at POP level or POP.price level.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: The effective end date of the individual price to which the product offering is attached. For simple pricing price.price.validFor.endDateTimeFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.validFor.endDateTime//Customization Instruction: Validate during implementation whether validity or price versioning is done at POP level or POP.price level.

fields.name: DutyFreeAmount
fields.comment: Duty free amount. For simple pricing price.price.dutyFreeAmount.valueFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.dutyFreeAmount.value

fields.name: CurrencyInd
fields.comment: Indicates the currency of the price. For simple pricing price.price.dutyFreeAmount.unitFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.dutyFreeAmount.unit

fields.name: TaxIncludedAmount
fields.comment: Tax included amount. For simple pricing price.price.taxIncludedAmountFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.taxIncludedAmount

fields.name: PriceReductionAmount
fields.comment: Price reduction amount. For simple pricing price.price.priceReductionFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.priceReduction

fields.name: PricePercentage
fields.comment: The percentage related to the price. For simple pricing price.price.percentageFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.percentage

fields.name: PriceUnitCount
fields.comment: The price unit count. For simple pricing price.price.pricedNumberOfUnitsFor complex pricing price.priceRecord.price.pricedNumberOfUnits

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
